item.description:
This St. Patrick’s Day, learn how to MAKE a little Luck o’ the Irish!

Join Veriditas Labyrinth Facilitator, Deborah Yaffee, for the WORLD DEBUT of The Lucky Labyrinth and ….

• Create your own Labyrinth to take home

• Learn the 5 secret steps to manifesting your heart’s desire

• Learn the Energy Meridian Tapping Technique that rapidly clears the limiting beliefs that are hijacking your Luck

• Receive a special luck message at the center of your labyrinth walk

• Enjoy tasty Irish treats from Chef Marty

Fee: $40

$35 for FCC and RVM Coop Members

Space is limited. Please register by March 15th! Register at www.riversidehealingarts.com/labyrinth.htm Questions? Call 413-625-2800
item.name: Lucky Labyrinth Playshop
